channel.title: programming on CS Research
channel.description: Recent content in programming on CS Research

item.title: Programming
item.description: In this article we investigate several programming languages. We will understand the difference between them and we will try to explain why we have so many programming languages. Our favorite programming language is Julia. We will explain why and we will try to motivate you to learn multiple programming languages. We think a software engineer should know at least 3 programming languages. What is a Programming Language? Here’s an explanation of programming languages, interpreters, and compilers:
